author: cziegeler
msg: This fixes the NPE recently found in the chaperon examples.
The problem is that after a getInputStream/toSAX to a SitemapSource,
this method couldn't be called a second time.
Uncommenting this line from the reset() method solves *this* problem,
but does it create new ones?
(I'm really glad that we can trash all this in 2.2)

author: cziegeler
msg: Workaround for the chaperon samples - it seams that after you call getInputStream()
on a SitemapSource, the environment is broken :(

author: joerg
msg: fixed wrong XMLDB URL syntax check (fixes bug 24901, thanks to Martin Holz)

author: joerg
msg: from an code formatting POV: shouldn't fields be at the beginning of a class?
